title: Spiced chicken dumpling soup
description: This spicy chicken soup recipe adds Thai freshness, with coconut and fragrant herbs, to the comforting classic.
ingredients: 60g/2½oz canned bamboo shoots, drained and finely chopped
1 long red chilli, seeds removed, finely chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 kaffir lime leaves (or 2 pieces lime zest)
3cm/1.2in piece fresh root ginger, peeled and thinly sliced
½ tsp caster sugar, or to taste
60g/2½oz rice noodles, soaked in water for 30 seconds and drained
